resources.string: Read the information and then choose an option below. Press Help for more instructions and information.

You are on a flight when disaster strikes. An explosion in an engine causes deadly gasses to be released into the cockpit through the air ventilation system. The pilots and crew switch off the air vents, but it is too late - they are dead. You are now in charge of landing the plane safely and saving all the passengers.

To play the game: read the description and then choose an option. There are up to 3 choices for each question. When the game ends, either through success or failure, it will reset so you can play again and choose different answers. If you want to start again before the game has finished, press the reset button.
